Material used.Description: Protein-protein interaction analysis using yeast two-hybrid screening.

Readout description.Result Description: TTRAP binding to M26I variant was reduced compared to wild-type DJ-1.
TTRAP binding to L166P variant was reduced compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each interaction assay was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type DJ-1 was used as a positive control for TTRAP interaction.

Basic negative control.Description: A non-interacting protein was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: Student's t-test was used to compare interaction levels between variants.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: TTRAP binding detected in at least 80% of replicates.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: TTRAP binding detected in less than 20% of replicates.

Material used.Description: Assessment of cell viability and apoptosis after proteasome inhibition.

Readout description.Result Description: M26I variant caused 40% higher apoptosis compared to wild-type DJ-1.
L166P variant caused 35% higher apoptosis compared to wild-type DJ-1.

Biological replicates.Description: Three independent biological replicates were performed.

Technical replicates.Description: Each apoptosis assay was repeated in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Proteasome inhibitor treatment was used as a positive control for apoptosis.

Basic negative control.Description: Untreated cells were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used to compare apoptosis levels between groups.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Apoptosis level less than 10% of control cells.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Apoptosis level greater than 30% of control cells.
